General.Name: Uzhnyi Kuzbass
General.Description: Southern Kuzbass Coal company Public joint-stock company produces coking and steam coal in Russia. Its mines are located in Mezhdurechensk, Kemerovo region. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Mezhdurechensk, Russia. Southern Kuzbass Coal company Public joint-stock company operates as a subsidiary of Mechel PAO

0.Name: Mr. Victor Nikolaevich Skulditskiy
0.Title: Chief Exec. Officer, Managing Director and Director
